cast.overview: Chan Wing Yan, a young police officer, has been sent undercover as a mole in the local mafia. Lau Kin Ming, a young mafia member, infiltrates the police force. Years later, their older counterparts, Chen Wing Yan and Inspector Lau Kin Ming, respectively, race against time to expose the mole within their midst.
cast.title: Infernal Affairs

details.biography: Elva Hsiao Ya-Hsuan (Chinese: 蕭亞軒) is a Taiwanese singer and one of Mandopop's "Queens of Heaven". Her R&B-influenced ballads have made her a top-selling Asian artist with a huge fan base. Her debut album became Taiwan's best-selling in 1999, selling almost a million copies. She's also acted in supporting roles in movies like Infernal Affairs. In August 2023, Warner Music China signed Hsiao, with executives praising her unique talent and music's emotional impact.
details.name: Elva Hsiao
